meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels show 02271.1. The red needle points to approximately 6 ticks past the 0.03 mark, indicating a value of 0.036. Rounded to 0.01 resolution, this becomes 0.04. The needle angle is calculated based on linear interpolation between 0.03 (at ~150 deg) and 0.04 (at ~210 deg), resulting in 186 degrees for 0.036.
